ComicInfo.Title: --And Odin Dies!
ComicInfo.Summary: --And Odin Dies!: Odin appears to be dead. Thor and his allies fight Mangog. Odin revives. Mangog draws the Odinsword from its sheath, thus endangering the entire universe. Odin casts a spell to return the Odinsword to its sheath, but the effort kills him. Thor defeats Mangog. Odin may still possess a spark of life. Thor swings his hammer and freezes time around his father until a cure for his apparent death can be found.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:18:35. [Issue ID 25035]
